Header: I challenge these hypocrites, try to win the no confidence motion if you can: Min. Premadasa
Content: An event was held on Saturday to distribute the Semata Sevana – Visiri Housing Loans for residents of the Monaragala District. The housing loans were presented at the Mahanama National School Auditorium in Monaragala under the auspices of Minister of Housing and Construction Sajith Premadasa. Rs. 180 Million were distributed among 1210 low income earning families in the Monaragala district under the proposed housing loan scheme . Minister of Housing and Construction, Sajith Premadasa charged that an attempt is being made to destabilise the good governance government, which is implementing projects such as Udagammana and Gamudawa. He explained that they are trying to destabilise the government which has allocated a historic amount of funding for construction of houses, by bringing a no confidence motion against the finance minister. “I would like to say something to these hypocrites, on the first of May they tried to coronate an individual in Kirulapone. They had to return home without their clothes. Next week when they forward the no confidence motion, they will have to go home without any clothing”,said the minister who went on raise a challenge to try and win the no confidence motion.
